entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Remove DebuggerContractVersionCheck #56742
    17.0
  • `StackAllocArrayCreationExpressionSyntax.Update` does not account for the `stackAllocKeyword` parameter #56740
  • Error CS8032 An instance of analyzer System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.JsonSourceGenerator cannot be created from (...) #56738

Closed

  • CompilerVisibleProperty semicolon escaping bug #51692

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #56747
    Area-Compilers
  • Hook up NFW in OOP #56743
    Area-IDE, 17.0
  • Fix unused Update parameter #56741
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/inline_errors #56736
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Report correct severity for Hot Reload rude edits #56734
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Add context.default.vs.core.version shared property to OOP telemetry session #56739
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56735
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56737
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, UX Review Not Required

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56749
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix ALC in ProjectReference scenarios #56662
    Area-Compilers
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Update to the latest debugger contracts #56722
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56729
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, UX Review Not Required
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56728
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, UX Review Not Required
  • List-patterns: mitigate break with Length property patterns #56721
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Target interactive host and tests to net6.0 #56705
    Area-Interactive
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Disable nullable analysis during EnC emit #56538
    Area-Compilers, Area-Interactive, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
